ta.title: ஜனாதிபதியிடமிருந்து ஒரு சிறப்பு வர்த்தமானி
body_lines: பிரத்தியேக வர்த்தமானி அரசியலமைப்பின் (1) பிரிவு 44 (1) அரசியலமைப்பால் வெளியிடப்பட்டுள்ளது.
විවිධ අමාත්‍යවරයන් භාරයේ පවත්නා විෂයයන්, කාර්යයන්, දෙපාර්තමේන්තු, ව්‍යවස්ථාපිත ආයතන හා රාජ්‍ය සංස්ථා යන ආයතනවල කාර්යයන් එහි විස්තර කර ඇත.

en.title: A special gazette from the president
body_lines: The Exclusive Gazette has been released by the Constitution of Article 44 (1) of the Constitution (1).
The functions of the subjects, functions, departments, departments, statutory bodies of various ministers and state corporations have been described.

summary_lines: Special presidential publication outlines roles, responsibilities of government ministries, departments, and state corporations as per Article 44(1) of the Constitution.
